message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $9000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite comfortable with $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10000?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $10250. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9900?
